response.overview: After an embarrassing incident, Luda, a shy museum guard and immigrant from the Soviet Union, realizes that her shyness and language barrier have kept her apart from the world, and decides to finally find her place in it.
response.tagline: After an embarrassing incident, Luda, a shy museum guard and immigrant from the Soviet Union, realizes that her shyness and language barrier have kept her apart from the world, and decides to finally find her place in it.
response.title: The Guard
